## Accessory Programs

Additional helper programs are included in the EDirect package. They help eliminate the need to write custom scripts to further filter out query results.

nquire
: Retrieves data from remote servers with URLs constructed from command line arguments.

tramsute
: Converts a concatenate stream of JSON objects or other structured formats into XML.

xtract
: Uses waypoints to navigate a complex XML hierarchy and obtain data values by field name.
